org.streaminer.util

Class SizeOf

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.streaminer.util.SizeOf

  • public class SizeOf
extends Object
    A simple implementation of C++ keyword sizeof for Java 5+
    Version:
    0.6
    Author:
    Nicola Santi, Marco Rosi
    See Also:
    java#lang#instrument#Instrument

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SizeOf() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static long deepSizeOf(Object objectToSize)
      Compute an implementation-specific approximation of the amount of storage consumed by objectToSize and by all the objects reachable from it
      static String humanReadable(long size)
      Format size in a human readable format
      static long iterativeSizeOf(Object objectToSize)
      Deprecated. 
      use deepSizeOf
      static void premain(String options, Instrumentation inst)
      Callback method used by the Java VM to inject the java.lang.instrument.Instrument instance
      static void setLogOutputStream(OutputStream o)
      Sets the OutputStream to use for logging.
      static void setMinSizeToLog(long min_class_size_to_log)
      The objects processed by deepSizeOf are logged to the log output stream if their size (in byte) is greater than this value.
      static long sizeOf(Object object)
      Calls java.lang.instrument.Instrument.getObjectSize(object).
      static void skipFinalField(boolean skip_final_field)
      If true deepSizeOf() doesn't compute the final fields of an object.
      static void skipFlyweightObject(boolean skip)
      If true flyweight objects has a size of 0.
      static void skipStaticField(boolean skip_static_field)
      If true deepSizeOf() doesn't compute the static fields of an object.
      static void turnOffDebug()
      Turn off debugging information
      static void turnOnDebug()

    • Method Detail

      • premain

        public static void premain(String options,
           Instrumentation inst)
        Callback method used by the Java VM to inject the java.lang.instrument.Instrument instance

      • sizeOf

        public static long sizeOf(Object object)
        Calls java.lang.instrument.Instrument.getObjectSize(object).
        Parameters:
        object - the object to size
        Returns:
        an implementation-specific approximation of the amount of storage consumed by the specified object.
        See Also:
        java#lang#instrument#Instrument#Instrumentation#getObjectSize(Object objectToSize)

      • humanReadable

        public static String humanReadable(long size)
        Format size in a human readable format
        Parameters:
        size -
        Returns:
        a string representation of the size argument followed by b for byte, Kb for kilobyte or Mb for megabyte

      • deepSizeOf

        public static long deepSizeOf(Object objectToSize)
        Compute an implementation-specific approximation of the amount of storage consumed by objectToSize and by all the objects reachable from it
        Parameters:
        objectToSize -
        Returns:
        an implementation-specific approximation of the amount of storage consumed by objectToSize and by all the objects reachable from it

      • iterativeSizeOf

        public static long iterativeSizeOf(Object objectToSize)
                            throws IllegalArgumentException,
                                   IllegalAccessException,
                                   IOException
        Deprecated. use deepSizeOf
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException
        IllegalAccessException
        IOException

      • setMinSizeToLog

        public static void setMinSizeToLog(long min_class_size_to_log)
        The objects processed by deepSizeOf are logged to the log output stream if their size (in byte) is greater than this value. The default value is 1024*1024 (1 megabyte), 0 turn off logging

      • skipFinalField

        public static void skipFinalField(boolean skip_final_field)
        If true deepSizeOf() doesn't compute the final fields of an object. Default value is false.

      • skipStaticField

        public static void skipStaticField(boolean skip_static_field)
        If true deepSizeOf() doesn't compute the static fields of an object. Default value is false.

      • skipFlyweightObject

        public static void skipFlyweightObject(boolean skip)
        If true flyweight objects has a size of 0. Default value is false.

      • setLogOutputStream

        public static void setLogOutputStream(OutputStream o)
        Sets the OutputStream to use for logging. The default OutputStream is System.out
        Parameters:
        o -

      • turnOnDebug

        public static void turnOnDebug()
        Turn on debugging information

      • turnOffDebug

        public static void turnOffDebug()
        Turn off debugging information
